Text: This movie is a MUST. It's like Monty Python in space.
I saw this on tv several years ago and thought it was hilarious! Finally I've found it here =) Thanx a lot
Great. It's very exciting to find this. Dan O'Bannon, who co-wrote this with John Carpenter, later re-wrote the plotline and developed the script for what eventually turned into "Alien". Thank you.
